root.name: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku
root.description: OverviewIn Dragonball Z: The Legacy of Goku you play as Goku, who returns to visit his master only to have Gohan kidnapped! Dragonball Z: The Legacy of Goku follows the Dragonball Z TV show plot almost exactly. It even has the TV intro as a videoclip. But this time it's up to you to rescue Gohan, save Earth from Saiyans and travel to the alien world of Namek to fight the ultimate evil, Frieza.

similar_games.game: Dragon Ball Z: Legacy of Goku II
